thread.title: Associations to submit activities by October 30
thread.title_full: Associations to submit activities by October 30

title: Associations to submit activities by October 30
text:
Sports News | 21 October 2015 17:00 CET Associations to submit activities by October 30 By GNA 
Accra, Oct. 20, GNA - The National Sports Authority (NSA) has asked Secretary General of all Associations to submit their activities and programmes by close of work on October 30. 
Information gathered from the NSA said, the decision is to help plan the Authority's 2016 calendar to guide them for the year as well as ensure effective management of resources. 
According to the information, some associations over the years have failed to inform the Authority of their plans and programmes, making planning very difficult. 
It said, the decision is also to ensure that, the activities are thoroughly analysed before they are forwarded to the Director-General of the Authority. 
GNA
